mean_cn: adj.巨大的，突然的，急剧的；戏剧的，戏剧性的；引人注目的；逼真的，刺激的
mean_en: (of a change, an event, etc.) sudden, very great and often surprising; exciting and impressive
sentence: The dramatic decline of the stock value was a big blow for him.
sentence_trans: 这次股价的暴跌对他来说是一个极大的打击。
word_etyma: drama戏剧 + tic形容词后缀 → dramatic戏剧的，戏剧性的
